entry.title: é˜²æŠ–å’ŒèŠ‚æµ
entry.content:
HTML

<button onclick="lazyFunc()">é˜²æŠ–</button>
<button onclick="lazyFunc2()">èŠ‚æµ</button>

JS

function fn() {
    console.log('é˜²æŠ–', this);
}
function debounce(func, wait = 1000) {
    // å½“å‰çš„ä½œç”¨åŸŸæ˜¯ä¸é”€æ¯çš„
    let timer = null;
    return function () {
        // å½“å‰ä½œç”¨åŸŸçš„thisæ˜¯btnå…ƒç´ 
        clearTimeout(timer);
        timer = setTimeout(() => {
            func.call(this);
            timer = null;
        }, wait);
    }
}
let lazyFunc = debounce(fn, 1000);


function throttle(func, wait = 1000) {
    let timer = null;
    return function () {
        if (!timer)
            timer = setInterval(() => {
                func.call(this)
                clearInterval(timer)
                timer = null
            }, wait)
    }
}
function fn2() {
    console.log('èŠ‚æµ', this)
}
let lazyFunc2 = throttle(fn2, 1000);

entry.title: é£å…¥æ•ˆæœ(è´­ç‰©è½¦)
entry.content:
åŸºäºjQueryçš„flyæ¥å®ç°2ç‚¹é—´çš„æ›²çº¿è¿åŠ¨ï¼Œé€‚é…ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯ã€‚

HTML

<div class="circle"></div>
<div class="end"></div>

CSS

 .circle {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            position: absolute;
            background: red;
            border-radius: 50%;
            top: 25%;
        }

.end {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            position: absolute;
            background: blue;
            border-radius: 50%;
            top: 65%;
            left: 20%;
        }

.ballFly {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            background-color: red;
            border-radius: 100%;
        }

JS

    var endOffset = $('.end').offset();
    $(window).resize(function () {
        endOffset = $('.end').offset();	//å½“é¡µé¢å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–æ—¶é‡æ–°è®¡ç®—å±æ€§å€¼
    })
    $('.circle').click(function (event) {

        var flyer = $("<div class=\"ballFly\"></div>").clone();//åŠ¨æ€åˆ›å»ºæŠ›ç‰©ä½“å¯¹è±¡å¹¶å…‹éš†
        var scrollTop = $(document).scrollTop();//å½“é¡µé¢æœ‰æ»šåŠ¨æ¡æ—¶
        flyer.fly({
            start: {
                left: event.pageX,
                top: event.pageY - scrollTop
            },
            end: {
                left: endOffset.left + 20,
                top: endOffset.top + 20,
                width: 0,
                height: 0
            },
            onEnd: function () {
                $('.end').css({
                    background: 'red'
                });
                setTimeout(function () {
                    $('.end').css({
                        background: 'blue'
                    });
                }, 200); $(flyer).remove();
            }
        });
    });

fly.js (æºç )

(function ($) {
        $.fly = function (element, options) {
            // é»˜è®¤å€¼
            var defaults = {
                version: '1.0.0',
                autoPlay: true,
                vertex_Rtop: 20, // é»˜è®¤é¡¶ç‚¹é«˜åº¦topå€¼
                speed: 1.2,
                start: {}, // top, left, width, height
                end: {},
                onEnd: $.noop
            };

            var self = this,
                $element = $(element);

            /**
             * åˆå§‹åŒ–ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œnewçš„æ—¶å€™å³è°ƒç”¨
             */
            self.init = function (options) {
                this.setOptions(options);
                !!this.settings.autoPlay && this.play();
            };

            /**
             * è®¾ç½®ç»„ä»¶å‚æ•°
             */
            self.setOptions = function (options) {
                this.settings = $.extend(true, {}, defaults, options);
                var settings = this.settings,
                    start = settings.start,
                    end = settings.end;

                $element.css({
                    marginTop: '0px',
                    marginLeft: '0px',
                    position: 'fixed'
                }).appendTo('body');
                // è¿åŠ¨è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­æœ‰æ”¹å˜å¤§å°
                if (end.width != null && end.height != null) {
                    $.extend(true, start, {
                        width: $element.width(),
                        height: $element.height()
                    });
                }
                // è¿åŠ¨è½¨è¿¹æœ€é«˜ç‚¹topå€¼
                var vertex_top = Math.min(start.top, end.top) - Math.abs(start.left - end.left) / 3;
                if (vertex_top < settings.vertex_Rtop) {
                    // å¯èƒ½å‡ºç°èµ·ç‚¹æˆ–è€…ç»ˆç‚¹å°±æ˜¯è¿åŠ¨æ›²çº¿é¡¶ç‚¹çš„æƒ…å†µ
                    vertex_top = Math.min(settings.vertex_Rtop, Math.min(start.top, end.top));
                }

                /**
                 * ======================================================
                 * è¿åŠ¨è½¨è¿¹åœ¨é¡µé¢ä¸­çš„topå€¼å¯ä»¥æŠ½è±¡æˆå‡½æ•° y = a * x*x + b;
                 * a = curvature
                 * b = vertex_top
                 * ======================================================
                 */

                var distance = Math.sqrt(Math.pow(start.top - end.top, 2) + Math.pow(start.left - end.left, 2)),
                    // å…ƒç´ ç§»åŠ¨æ¬¡æ•°
                    steps = Math.ceil(Math.min(Math.max(Math.log(distance) / 0.05 - 75, 30), 100) / settings.speed),
                    ratio = start.top == vertex_top ? 0 : -Math.sqrt((end.top - vertex_top) / (start.top - vertex_top)),
                    vertex_left = (ratio * start.left - end.left) / (ratio - 1),
                    // ç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µï¼Œå‡ºç°é¡¶ç‚¹left==ç»ˆç‚¹leftï¼Œå°†æ›²ç‡è®¾ç½®ä¸º0ï¼Œåšç›´çº¿è¿åŠ¨ã€‚
                    curvature = end.left == vertex_left ? 0 : (end.top - vertex_top) / Math.pow(end.left - vertex_left, 2);

                $.extend(true, settings, {
                    count: -1, // æ¯æ¬¡é‡ç½®ä¸º-1
                    steps: steps,
                    vertex_left: vertex_left,
                    vertex_top: vertex_top,
                    curvature: curvature
                });
            };

            /**
             * å¼€å§‹è¿åŠ¨ï¼Œå¯è‡ªå·±è°ƒç”¨
             */
            self.play = function () {
                this.move();
            };

            /**
             * æŒ‰stepè¿åŠ¨
             */
            self.move = function () {
                var settings = this.settings,
                    start = settings.start,
                    count = settings.count,
                    steps = settings.steps,
                    end = settings.end;
                // è®¡ç®—left topå€¼
                var left = start.left + (end.left - start.left) * count / steps,
                    top = settings.curvature == 0 ? start.top + (end.top - start.top) * count / steps : settings.curvature * Math.pow(left - settings.vertex_left, 2) + settings.vertex_top;
                // è¿åŠ¨è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­æœ‰æ”¹å˜å¤§å°
                if (end.width != null && end.height != null) {
                    var i = steps / 2,
                        width = end.width - (end.width - start.width) * Math.cos(count < i ? 0 : (count - i) / (steps - i) * Math.PI / 2),
                        height = end.height - (end.height - start.height) * Math.cos(count < i ? 0 : (count - i) / (steps - i) * Math.PI / 2);
                    $element.css({
                        width: width + "px",
                        height: height + "px",
                        "font-size": Math.min(width, height) + "px"
                    });
                }
                $element.css({
                    left: left + "px",
                    top: top + "px"
                });
                settings.count++;
                // å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡
                var time = window.requestAnimationFrame($.proxy(this.move, this));
                if (count == steps) {
                    window.cancelAnimationFrame(time);
                    // fire callback
                    settings.onEnd.apply(this);
                }
            };

            /**
             * é”€æ¯
             */
            self.destory = function () {
                $element.remove();
            };

            self.init(options);
        };

        // add the plugin to the jQuery.fn object
        $.fn.fly = function (options) {
            return this.each(function () {
                if (undefined == $(this).data('fly')) {
                    $(this).data('fly', new $.fly(this, options));
                }
            });
        };
    })(jQuery);

Github
Gridea ä¸»é¡µ
ç¤ºä¾‹ç½‘ç«™

ç‰¹æ€§ğŸ‘‡

ğŸ“ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨æœ€é…·çš„ Markdown è¯­æ³•ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œå¿«é€Ÿåˆ›ä½œ

ğŸŒ‰ ä½ å¯ä»¥ç»™æ–‡ç« é…ä¸Šç²¾ç¾çš„å°é¢å›¾å’Œåœ¨æ–‡ç« ä»»æ„ä½ç½®æ’å…¥å›¾ç‰‡

ğŸ·ï¸ ä½ å¯ä»¥å¯¹æ–‡ç« è¿›è¡Œæ ‡ç­¾åˆ†ç»„

ğŸ“‹ ä½ å¯ä»¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰èœå•ï¼Œç”šè‡³å¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºå¤–éƒ¨é“¾æ¥èœå•

ğŸ’¬ ä½ å¯ä»¥è¿›è¡Œç®€å•çš„é…ç½®ï¼Œæ¥å…¥ Gitalk æˆ– DisqusJS è¯„è®ºç³»ç»Ÿ

ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ä¸­æ–‡ç®€ä½“æˆ–è‹±è¯­

ğŸŒ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä»»æ„ä½¿ç”¨åº”ç”¨å†…é»˜è®¤ä¸»é¢˜æˆ–ä»»æ„ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹ä¸»é¢˜ï¼Œå¼ºå¤§çš„ä¸»é¢˜è‡ªå®šä¹‰èƒ½åŠ›

ğŸ–¥ ä½ å¯ä»¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰æºæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨ OneDriveã€ç™¾åº¦ç½‘ç›˜ã€iCloudã€Dropbox ç­‰è¿›è¡Œå¤šè®¾å¤‡åŒæ­¥

ğŸŒ± å½“ç„¶ Gridea è¿˜å¾ˆå¹´è½»ï¼Œæœ‰å¾ˆå¤šä¸è¶³ï¼Œä½†è¯·ç›¸ä¿¡ï¼Œå®ƒä¼šä¸åœå‘å‰ ğŸƒ

æœªæ¥ï¼Œå®ƒä¸€å®šä¼šæˆä¸ºä½ ç¦»ä¸å¼€çš„ä¼™ä¼´
